instruction: Replace all pronouns with the appropriate nouns.
input: She gave her a present
output: Mary gave Jane a present.

instruction: Determine the object of the sentence.
input: He planted a tree in the yard.
output: The object of the sentence is "tree".

instruction: Find the root word of the given word.
input: Universities
output: The root word of "universities" is "university".

instruction: Create a list of five things one should do before traveling.
output:
1. Purchase travel insurance.
2. Book flights and accommodations in advance.
3. Prepare an itinerary with a day-by-day breakdown.
4. Pack the essential items needed.
5. Check passport and visa requirements.

instruction: Name three common types of atmospheric pressure
output: Three common types of atmospheric pressure are low pressure, high pressure, and frontal pressure.

instruction: Order the following characters from oldest to youngest
input: Ned, Arya, Bran
output: Ned, Bran, Arya.

instruction: Remove the last two words of the given sentence.
input: This is the best way to do it.
output: This is the best way to.

instruction: Describe what would happen if the given situation took place.
input: If the Earth suddenly stopped rotating
output: The day-night cycle and the climate would become chaotic. The oceans and atmosphere would be affected, leading to large-scale disruption of weather patterns, ocean currents, and a variety of other ecosystems. Atmospheric winds would change direction and oceanic currents would be disrupted.

instruction: Create a sentence using the given verb and adjective.
input:
Verb: glow
Adjective: luminous
output: The sky was illuminated with a luminous glow.

instruction: Provide a solution to this problem.
input: A cyclist is biking from Point A to Point B. Along the way, he passes point C, which is one-third of the distance from A to B. At what point is the cyclist halfway to his destination?
output: The cyclist is halfway to his destination at point C.

instruction: Explain what the given phrase means.
input: In the wee hours of the morning
output: In the wee hours of the morning refers to the early hours of the day, usually between midnight and dawn.

instruction: Rewrite this sentence using the opposite of the given adjective.
input:
The student is incredibly intelligent.
Adjective: Intelligent
output: The student is incredibly unintelligent.

instruction: Can you complete the analogy?
input: Car is to drive as bike is to
output: Ride.

instruction: Categorize the given object into one of the given categories.
input:
Object: Book
Categories: Furniture and Literature
output: Literature.

instruction: Convert a given decimal number to binary.
Rearrange the phrase such that it is in an alphabetical order
input: Cat, pig, dog
output: Cat, dog, pig

instruction: Explain what wind power is.
output: Wind power is a form of renewable energy that is generated by harnessing the natural power of the wind. Wind turbines are used to convert the kinetic energy in wind into electrical energy, which can then be used to power homes and businesses.

instruction: Convert a sentence into a rap.
input: Life is beautiful if you live it right.
output: Living life can be so bright/If you see it through the light/Heed the choices that you make/Keep it true and don't partake/Things will come so start today/Live each day just your own way/Life is beautiful if you live it right.

instruction: Merge two texts and make a summary out of them.
input:
Text 1:
The ongoing pandemic have posed harsh challenges to the health care system in many countries.

Text 2:
Governments of various countries have taken numerous steps in a bid to contain the spread of infection.
output: The COVID-19 pandemic has presented significant obstacles to global health care systems. In response, governments around the world have implemented various measures to reduce the spread of the virus.

instruction: Generate a product review for a given product.
input: Cocoapro T-shirt
output: I recently bought the Cocoapro T-shirt and I absolutely love it! It's so soft and comfortable to wear. The material is breathable and it fits great. The colors are vibrant and the quality is excellent. I would definitely recommend this t-shirt!

instruction: Suggest the next step in a given problem-solving task.
input: A person is trying to break a code but is stuck.
output: The next step would be to look for patterns in the code and analyze the data to try and identify a possible solution.

instruction: Generate a tip for a given exercise.
input: Pushups
output: A tip for doing pushups is to keep your body in a straight line from head to toe and focus on engaging your core muscles to make the exercise more effective.

instruction: Create a children's story based on a given theme.
input: Friendship
output: Once upon a time, there were two best friends named Daisy and Lily. They both always loved to explore and have grand adventures together. One day, they traveled to a magical kingdom filled with wondrous creatures and treats. Along the way, they made new friends, discovered hidden gems, and experienced the joys of true friendship. They cherished the memories they made and vowed to be lifelong companions.

instruction: Generate a resume for a given job applicant.
input: John Smith

John Smith

ABC Company, 2019-present

•	Processed customer orders and ensured accurate data entry

IT Support Technician 
XYZ Company, 2017-2019

Education

ABC Institute, 2018

instruction: Generate the comparative form for the given adjective.
input: large
output: larger
